about_the_game:
Game Content

The core gameplay of this game is a "text-based puzzle visual novel".
You'll need to search the cursed environment for hidden "Reifu" cards.
By combining these cards, you'll gradually uncover key events to break the curse.
Afterward, you'll be able to view memory fragments revealed by the "Yuan Shadow".
Through your choices, you can change their fate and guide them to "Higan"!

Game Features

  • A unique text-based puzzle game combined with various mini-game elements, making every step full of surprises!
  • Characters with cat ears, fox ears, and rabbit ears make their appearances, and their ears even move!
  • A caring but clumsy Onee-chan, a timid yet strong-hearted girl, and a wise and eternally youthful wife—are you ready to meet them?
  • Step into the mysterious world of Shrine Miko, and experience the intriguing charm of ancient rituals and mystical powers...

Tips

  • This game is suitable for players who like to read text.
  • The puzzle elements in this game require you to use your imagination to visualize the environment and gradually observe changes to find clues. Overall, a bit of creativity is needed.
  • If you find the above challenging, you can check the "Tips" in the menu during puzzles to get key steps. This will make the gameplay experience much easier.

content_descriptors.notes:
In the hot spring scene, the character's clothing will appear revealing.
The villain has violent and explicit actions in the story.

short_description: “Anyone who is destined, please help us....” A text-based puzzle game themed around shrine Miko. Explore an abandoned village, ancient and mysterious shrines, and eerie sacrificial rituals by combining nouns and verbs. Gradually uncover the truth hidden behind the story.
